languages.text:
Парой яростных окриков она убедила сгрудившихся в переулке, что к ним приближается монстр, идущий за их головами. Ложь. Я иду лишь за Жертвой.
Меня встречает заполошный огонь, и, совершив резкий подъем, я срываю с пояса пару плазменных гранат и мечу их в толпу.

It only takes the Prey a couple of furious shouts to convince those huddled in the alley that a monster is coming for their heads. Lies. I am only pursuing the Prey.
I am met with frantic gunfire and, after making a sharp ascent, I take a pair of plasma grenades from my belt and hurl them into the crowd.
languages.original_text:
Парой яростных окриков она убедила сгрудившихся в переулке, что к ним приближается монстр, идущий за их головами. Ложь. Я иду лишь за Жертвой.
Меня встречает заполошный огонь, и, совершив резкий подъем, я срываю с пояса пару плазменных гранат и мечу их в толпу.

languages.text:
路地でうずくまっている者たちに怪物が命を奪いにやって来ると信じさせるには、獲物が2、3回猛烈な雄叫びをあげるだけで良い。だがそれは嘘だ。私が追っているのは獲物だけ。
猛烈な弾丸を浴びた私は、急上昇した後、ベルトからプラズマグレネードを一対取り出し、群衆の中に投げ込んだ。
languages.original_text:
It only takes the Prey a couple of furious shouts to convince those huddled in the alley that a monster is coming for their heads. Lies. I am only pursuing the Prey.
I am met with frantic gunfire and, after making a sharp ascent, I take a pair of plasma grenades from my belt and hurl them into the crowd.

traits.locale_text:
路地でうずくまっている者たちに怪物が命を奪いにやって来ると信じさせるには、獲物が2、3回猛烈な雄叫びをあげるだけで良い。だがそれは嘘だ。私が追っているのは獲物だけ。
猛烈な弾丸を浴びた私は、急上昇した後、ベルトからプラズマグレネードを一対取り出し、群衆の中に投げ込んだ。
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text:
猎物愤怒地咆哮起来，仅仅几句话，就让那些挤在巷子里的人以为某个怪物打算要他们的命。简直是无稽之谈，我只是想狩猎我的猎物而已。
随后，我遭遇了疯狂的枪声，于是我连忙攀升起来，从腰带上摘下两枚等离子手雷，朝人群丢了下去。
languages.original_text:
It only takes the Prey a couple of furious shouts to convince those huddled in the alley that a monster is coming for their heads. Lies. I am only pursuing the Prey.
I am met with frantic gunfire and, after making a sharp ascent, I take a pair of plasma grenades from my belt and hurl them into the crowd.

traits.locale_text: 猎物愤怒地咆哮起来，仅仅几句话，就让那些挤在巷子里的人以为某个怪物打算要他们的命。简直是无稽之谈，我只是想狩猎我的猎物而已。随后，我遭遇了疯狂的枪声，于是我连忙攀升起来，从腰带上摘下两枚等离子手雷，朝人群丢了下去。
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text:
A la presa le bastan un par de gritos furiosos para convencer a la gente refugiada en el callejón de que un monstruo viene a por sus cabezas. Es mentira. Solo voy a por la presa.
Me reciben con disparos frenéticos y, tras ascender bruscamente, saco un par de granadas de plasma del cinturón y las lanzo contra la multitud.
languages.original_text:
It only takes the Prey a couple of furious shouts to convince those huddled in the alley that a monster is coming for their heads. Lies. I am only pursuing the Prey.
I am met with frantic gunfire and, after making a sharp ascent, I take a pair of plasma grenades from my belt and hurl them into the crowd.

traits.speaker: Player

languages.text:
Die Beute benötigt nur einige wenige wilde Schreie, um alle in der Gasse zu überzeugen, dass ein Monster es auf ihre Köpfe abgesehen hat. Lügen. Ich verfolge nur die Beute.
Ich fliege in einen wilden Kugelhagel, und nach einem steilen Sturzflug nehme ich zwei Plasmagranaten aus meinem Gürtel und schleudere sie in die Menge.
languages.original_text:
It only takes the Prey a couple of furious shouts to convince those huddled in the alley that a monster is coming for their heads. Lies. I am only pursuing the Prey.
I am met with frantic gunfire and, after making a sharp ascent, I take a pair of plasma grenades from my belt and hurl them into the crowd.

traits.locale_text:
Die Beute benötigt nur einige wenige wilde Schreie, um alle in der Gasse zu überzeugen, dass ein Monster es auf ihre Köpfe abgesehen hat. Lügen. Ich habe es nur auf die Beute abgesehen.
Ich fliege in einen wilden Kugelhagel, und nach einem steilen Sturzflug nehme ich zwei Plasmagranaten aus meinem Gürtel und schleudere sie in die Menge.
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text:
En quelques cris furieux, la proie parvient à convaincre les passants qu'un monstre en a après leur vie. Mensonges. Seule la proie m'intéresse.
Je deviens la cible de nombreux tirs. Après une ascension abrupte, je décroche deux grenades à plasma de ma ceinture et les lance dans la foule.
languages.original_text:
It only takes the Prey a couple of furious shouts to convince those huddled in the alley that a monster is coming for their heads. Lies. I am only pursuing the Prey.
I am met with frantic gunfire and, after making a sharp ascent, I take a pair of plasma grenades from my belt and hurl them into the crowd.

traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: Avım, birkaç öfkeli bağırış ile meydanda toplanan kişileri canavarın birinin kellelerinin peşinde olduğuna ikna ediyor. Yalan. Ben yalnızca Avımın peşindeyim. Çılgınca silah atışlarıyla karşılanıyorum ve hızla yukarı yükseldikten sonra kemerimden bir çift plazma bombası çıkarıp kalabalığa savuruyorum.
languages.original_text:
It only takes the Prey a couple of furious shouts to convince those huddled in the alley that a monster is coming for their heads. Lies. I am only pursuing the Prey.
I am met with frantic gunfire and, after making a sharp ascent, I take a pair of plasma grenades from my belt and hurl them into the crowd.

traits.locale_text: Av'ın meydanda toplanan kişileri, canavarın birinin kellelerinin peşinde olduğuna ikna edebilmesi için birkaç öfkeli bağırış yeterli oluyor. Yalan. Ben yalnızca Av'ın peşindeyim. Çılgınca silah atışlarıyla karşılanıyorum ve hızla yukarı yükseldikten sonra kemerimden bir çift plazma bomba çıkarıp kalabalığa savuruyorum.
traits.speaker: Player
